by.epamtr.totalizator.dao

Interface ClientDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DBClientDAO

    public interface ClientDAO
    Interface contains methods which are required to provide user's work with the data storage.
    Author:
    Andrey

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Event> getCurrentEvents(int gameCouponId)
      Gets all the events available for betting from the data storage.
      GameCupoun getOpenedGame()
      Gets a game coupon with Opened status from the data storage.

    • Method Detail

      • registrationUser

        boolean registrationUser(User user,
                         java.lang.String login,
                         java.lang.String password)
                  throws DAOException
        Creates a new record representing a user in a data storage.
        Parameters:
        user - User object representing new user.
        login - user's login.
        password - encoded user's password.
        Returns:
        true if user registered successfully.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if new user's registration fails.

      • makeBet

        boolean makeBet(MakeBetDTO makeBetDTO,
                java.lang.String encryptedCardNumber)
         throws DAOException
        Creates a record representing a bet of a particular user in a data storage.
        Parameters:
        makeBetDTO - MakeBetDTO object.
        encryptedCardNumber - String that represents encrypted user's credit card number.
        Returns:
        true if bet registered successfully.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if bet registration fails.

      • getOpenedGame

        GameCupoun getOpenedGame()
                  throws DAOException
        Gets a game coupon with Opened status from the data storage.
        Returns:
        GameCupoun object.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if obtaining information from the data storage fails.

      • getCurrentEvents

        java.util.List<Event> getCurrentEvents(int gameCouponId)
                                throws DAOException
        Gets all the events available for betting from the data storage.
        Parameters:
        gameCouponId - Id of the currently available game coupon(status: Opened).
        Returns:
        List of Event objects.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if obtaining information from the data storage fails.
